author: Simon Difford
description: Lightly sweetened Scotch with a touch of aromatic bitter spice: like a homemade whisky liqueur.
name: Flying Scotsman
recipeIngredient: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice)
